mapper.select: Select * From EMP e LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPT d ON e.deptno = d.deptno order by empno
Select e.empno , e.ename, e.job, d.deptno, d.loc From EMP e , DEPT d WHERE e.deptno(+) = d.deptno order by empno
Select e.empno , e.ename, e.job, d.deptno, d.loc From EMP e , DEPT d WHERE e.deptno = d.deptno(+) order by empno
